name: dark
description: Tema oscuro con fondo azul nocturno profundo

pyqt5.stylesheet: /* ========================== TEMA: Dark (Azul Nocturno) ========================== */ QMainWindow { background-color: #0D0F22; } QWidget { color: #E2E8F0; font-family: 'Inter', 'Segoe UI', sans-serif; font-size: 13px; } /* ========== TABS ========== */ QTabWidget::pane { border: 1px solid #2C3549; border-radius: 8px; background-color: #1B2233; } QTabWidget::tab-bar { alignment: left; } QTabBar::tab { background-color: #252D42; color: #94A3B8; padding: 12px 20px; border: 1px solid #2C3549; border-bottom: none; border-top-left-radius: 4px; border-top-right-radius: 4px; font-weight: 600; min-width: 120px; } QTabBar::tab:hover { background-color: rgba(56, 189, 248, 0.1); color: #38BDF8; } QTabBar::tab:selected { background-color: #1B2233; color: #38BDF8; border-bottom: 3px solid #38BDF8; } /* ========== GROUP BOX (Cards) ========== */ QGroupBox { background-color: #1B2233; border: 1px solid #2C3549; border-radius: 8px; margin-top: 10px; padding: 15px; font-weight: 600; } QGroupBox::title { subcontrol-origin: margin; subcontrol-position: top left; padding: 0 5px; color: #38BDF8; font-size: 16px; } /* ========== BUTTONS ========== */ QPushButton { background-color: #38BDF8; color: #FFFFFF; border: 2px solid #38BDF8; border-radius: 4px; padding: 8px 20px; font-weight: 600; font-size: 13px; text-transform: uppercase; } QPushButton:hover { background-color: #0EA5E9; border-color: #0EA5E9; } QPushButton:pressed { background-color: #0284C7; } QPushButton:disabled { background-color: #2C3549; border-color: #2C3549; color: #64748B; } QPushButton[buttonStyle="secondary"] { background-color: transparent; color: #38BDF8; border: 2px solid #38BDF8; } QPushButton[buttonStyle="secondary"]:hover { background-color: #38BDF8; color: #FFFFFF; } /* ========== LINE EDIT ========== */ QLineEdit { background-color: #1E293B; border: 2px solid #334155; border-radius: 4px; padding: 8px 12px; color: #E2E8F0; selection-background-color: #38BDF8; } QLineEdit:focus { border-color: #38BDF8; } QLineEdit:disabled { background-color: #2C3549; color: #64748B; } /* ========== COMBO BOX ========== */ QComboBox { background-color: #1E293B; border: 2px solid #334155; border-radius: 4px; padding: 8px 12px; color: #E2E8F0; } QComboBox:focus { border-color: #38BDF8; } QComboBox:disabled { background-color: #2C3549; color: #64748B; } QComboBox::drop-down { border: none; width: 20px; } QComboBox::down-arrow { image: none; border-left: 5px solid transparent; border-right: 5px solid transparent; border-top: 5px solid #38BDF8; width: 0; height: 0; } QComboBox QAbstractItemView { background-color: #1B2233; border: 1px solid #2C3549; selection-background-color: #38BDF8; selection-color: #FFFFFF; } /* ========== SPIN BOX ========== */ QSpinBox { background-color: #1E293B; border: 2px solid #334155; border-radius: 4px; padding: 8px 12px; color: #E2E8F0; } QSpinBox:focus { border-color: #38BDF8; } /* ========== TEXT EDIT (Console) ========== */ QTextEdit { background-color: #0D0F22; border: 2px solid #2C3549; border-radius: 8px; padding: 12px; color: #E2E8F0; font-family: 'Fira Code', 'Consolas', monospace; font-size: 12px; } /* ========== PROGRESS BAR ========== */ QProgressBar { background-color: #1E293B; border: 2px solid #2C3549; border-radius: 4px; text-align: center; height: 24px; color: #FFFFFF; font-weight: 600; } QProgressBar::chunk { background: qlineargradient( x1:0, y1:0, x2:1, y2:0, stop:0 #38BDF8, stop:1 #0EA5E9 ); border-radius: 2px; } /* ========== LABELS ========== */ QLabel { color: #E2E8F0; background-color: transparent; } QLabel[labelStyle="title"] { font-size: 24px; font-weight: 700; color: #38BDF8; } QLabel[labelStyle="header"] { font-size: 16px; font-weight: 600; color: #E2E8F0; } QLabel[labelStyle="secondary"] { color: #94A3B8; font-size: 12px; } /* ========== SCROLL BAR ========== */ QScrollBar:vertical { background-color: #1B2233; width: 10px; border-radius: 5px; } QScrollBar::handle:vertical { background-color: #38BDF8; border-radius: 5px; min-height: 20px; } QScrollBar::handle:vertical:hover { background-color: #0EA5E9; } QScrollBar::add-line:vertical, QScrollBar::sub-line:vertical { height: 0px; } QScrollBar:horizontal { background-color: #1B2233; height: 10px; border-radius: 5px; } QScrollBar::handle:horizontal { background-color: #38BDF8; border-radius: 5px; min-width: 20px; } QScrollBar::handle:horizontal:hover { background-color: #0EA5E9; } QScrollBar::add-line:horizontal, QScrollBar::sub-line:horizontal { width: 0px; } /* ========== CHECKBOX & RADIO ========== */ QCheckBox, QRadioButton { spacing: 8px; color: #E2E8F0; } QCheckBox::indicator, QRadioButton::indicator { width: 18px; height: 18px; border: 2px solid #2C3549; background-color: #1B2233; } QCheckBox::indicator { border-radius: 3px; } QRadioButton::indicator { border-radius: 9px; } QCheckBox::indicator:checked, QRadioButton::indicator:checked { background-color: #38BDF8; border-color: #38BDF8; } QCheckBox::indicator:hover, QRadioButton::indicator:hover { border-color: #38BDF8; } QCheckBox::indicator:disabled, QRadioButton::indicator:disabled { background-color: #2C3549; border-color: #2C3549; } /* ========== TOOL TIP ========== */ QToolTip { background-color: #1B2233; color: #E2E8F0; border: 1px solid #38BDF8; padding: 5px; border-radius: 4px; } /* ========== MENU BAR ========== */ QMenuBar { background-color: #1B2233; color: #E2E8F0; border-bottom: 1px solid #2C3549; } QMenuBar::item { padding: 5px 10px; } QMenuBar::item:selected { background-color: #38BDF8; color: #FFFFFF; } /* ========== STATUS BAR ========== */ QStatusBar { background-color: #1B2233; color: #94A3B8; border-top: 1px solid #2C3549; } /* ========== SCROLL AREA ========== */ QScrollArea { background-color: transparent; border: none; } QScrollArea > QWidget > QWidget { background-color: transparent; } /* ========== MESSAGE BOX ========== */ QMessageBox { background-color: #1B2233; color: #E2E8F0; } QMessageBox QLabel { color: #E2E8F0; } QMessageBox QPushButton { min-width: 80px; } /* ========== MENU (Desplegable) ========== */ QMenu { background-color: #1B2233; color: #E2E8F0; border: 1px solid #2C3549; border-radius: 4px; padding: 5px; } QMenu::item { padding: 8px 20px; border-radius: 3px; } QMenu::item:selected { background-color: #38BDF8; color: #FFFFFF; } QMenu::item:disabled { color: #64748B; } QMenu::separator { height: 1px; background-color: #2C3549; margin: 5px 0px; } /* ========== DIALOG ========== */ QDialog { background-color: #1B2233; color: #E2E8F0; } QDialog QLabel { color: #E2E8F0; } QDialog QPushButton { min-width: 80px; } QDialog QLineEdit { background-color: #1E293B; color: #E2E8F0; } /* ========== TREE WIDGET ========== */ QTreeWidget { background-color: #1B2233; color: #E2E8F0; border: 2px solid #2C3549; border-radius: 4px; } QTreeWidget::item { color: #E2E8F0; } QTreeWidget::item:selected { background-color: #38BDF8; color: #FFFFFF; } QTreeWidget::item:hover { background-color: rgba(56, 189, 248, 0.1); } QHeaderView::section { background-color: #252D42; color: #E2E8F0; padding: 8px; border: 1px solid #2C3549; }
